properties.Name: PromotionType
properties.Description:
A categorization of Promotion Types based on common characteristics, objectives or incentives.

Ex:
- Sales promotion
- New product introduction promotion
- Product awareness promotion
- Public awareness
- Menu Item Specials
- AAA Discount
- Free Cell phone recharging
- Free gift boxes
- Free shipping
- Free bottled water
- Complimentary shopping bags

Columns.Name: PromotionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion Type.

Columns.Name: PromotionTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Promotion Type.

Columns.Name: PromotionTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Promotion Type.
